messages.subject: reading was Re: Vinegar & Baking Soda Volcano
messages.msgSnippet: i wouldnt worry about reading. isaac said he couldnt read and the truth is that he didnt like reading and he didnt read often. but he would read any lego
messages.messageBody:
i wouldnt worry about reading. isaac said he couldnt read and the truth is
that he didnt like reading and he didnt read often. but he would read any
lego catalog and that eventually led to chess manuals. and he is almost 9
and just read his first novel. so relax and trust your kid. they all read
eventually given the opportunity and support.

Andi...domestic goddess and active volunteer
mom to Isaac
tl2b@...

Never Underestimate the Power of This Woman!
